Articles.Content:
So, where does the center of lift have to be? I am always putting it front of CoG, and if that's correct, how far forward is most effective?

Also, one of my planes is pitching up uncontrollably. What's wrong with it?

...I am always putting it front of CoG,...

Also, one of my planes is pitching up uncontrollably. What's wrong with it?

My frient, that is why your planes pitch up.

You have to have the CoG and the centre of lift together in the same spot.

Of course, keep in mind that while your fuel consumes, you CoG will change!
Alright, thanks. I think I fixed my plane.
